pages.text: $(li)Taiga Mountains are a variant of the Taiga biome composed mostly of Podzol and Coarse dirt.$(br)$(li)They can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find some vegetation like Brown Mushrooms, Dandelions, Poppies, Violets and Spruce trees.

$(li)Some animals like $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/grizzly_bear)Grizzly Bears$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/bald_eagle)Bald Eagles$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/crow)Crows$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/raccoon)Raccoon$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/fox)Foxes$(/l) can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Taiga Mountains$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
